text: I had never tried this brand before, but I was looking for coconut oil, preferably organic, that was less expensive than I could find at local organic markets. Spectrum was too expensive, and I had tried Sunflower/Newflower's store brand but was not happy with it. This Nutiva is excellent, good aroma, good flavor, no off-tastes, and a very reasonable price. I will definitely be buying it again.
